Providing Vermont and other states with the flexibility to build upon health care reform will result in better care and greater access at a lower cost. Allowing us to become a laboratory for innovation and excellence will help Vermonters, while once again allowing us to lead the way. Patrick Leahy said, "While some in Washington are trying to turn the clock back on health reform, Vermont instead is moving forward. I think he would find it interesting, because we don't paint him as evil, we don't go after him, we actually paint him in a very sympathetic light.
